Jun 24, 2023 5:00 PM GMT+3

Location: Chicago, IL, US

Jun 24 Saturday LIVE Fine Art Auction

Art Legacy Auctions

This Art Legacy Auction has modern and contemporary works of art. This includes Originals and Limited Editions from a wide variety of artists: Picasso, Chagall, Miro, Salvador Dali, Tarkay, Peter Max, Erte and many others. Bid Now. Discover the new arrivals. We handle shipping in house which makes it easier for you. We also have telephone bidding so please call us to arrange this at 312-956-0901.Most items ship framed as shown and noted.
